original_text: The great courtyard was surrounded by a wall of three courses of dressed stone and one course of trimmed cedar beams, as was the inner courtyard of the temple of the Lord with its portico.
korean_text: 또 큰 뜰 주위에는 다듬은 돌 세 켜와 백향목 두꺼운 판자 한 켜를 놓았으니 마치 여호와의 성전 안뜰과 주랑에 놓은 것 같더라

sentences.original_text: The great courtyard was surrounded by a wall
of three courses of dressed stone
sentences.korean_translation: 다듬은 돌 세 겹으로 이루어진 벽이었고

sentences.original_text: and one course of trimmed cedar beams
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다듬은 백향목 들보 한 겹으로 이루어졌다

sentences.original_text: as was the inner courtyard of the temple of the Lord
